data.name: Game-Kun: Input Challenge
data.detailed_description:
Game-Kun: Input Challenge is a reaction-based hiscore mini game. Test your reflexes with your gamepad. Earning badges aids your progress through a course of challenge levels. Unlock skins and other characters to enhance the fun! Can you reach the final level and compete for the ultimate hiscore?

*Over 30 Skins to unlock at Launch and more Coming Soon!*
Unlock "Game-Kun" alternate colours and other characters along the way, can you collect them all?

We hope you like pressing buttons!
This game is not for "passive-gamers" or "screen watchers"!
Get ready to increase your reaction times, improve your controller skills and level up your brains!


Perfect for quick pick up and play sessions, or for playing while waiting for that pesky update to download...
Tons of replay value and potentially hours of play time while you compete to dominate the leaderboards!

Game-Kun: Input Challenge features a number of brain-busting input challenges including:
Regular Inputs
Don't Press Inputs
Colour Trick Inputs
Double Inputs
Triple Inputs
Multi-Combination Inputs

Developer: We are a small 2 person team trying to provide people with fun games that won't exist unless we make them...
If you pick up a copy of this game that would be awesome, we really appreciate your support!

data.short_description: Game-Kun: Input Challenge is a reaction-based hiscore mini game. Test your reflexes and input skills with your gamepad. Unlock skins and other characters to enhance the fun! Can you reach the final level and compete for the ultimate hiscore?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Or Nvidia
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb vram
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound enriches the gameplay experience!
  • Additional Notes: We will try to find the lowest posible settings and update soon!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Or Nvidia
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb vram
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound enriches the gameplay experience!
